app.title: Image Magician
app.subtitle: Before/After · Variable Image Generator
app.description: Upload two images to automatically generate variable images that display different content under different backgrounds
upload.dragText: Click or drag image to upload
upload.dragHint: Support common image formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.
preview.title: Live Preview
preview.uploadHint: Variable image will be generated automatically after upload
preview.description: Below is the generated variable image (white background shows 'before'), click to view the black background effect (shows 'after')
preview.clickToView: Click image to view full size
tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.tip1: Download the PNG image and upload it to Bilibili, forums, etc.
tips.tip2: You need to click 'View Original' to see the change effect
tips.tip3: Some platforms may compress images and lose transparency, be sure to view the original
message.generateFailed: Failed to generate variable image, please try again
footer.text: Image Magician · Make Your Images More Interesting
morePage.title: More features coming soon...
morePage.subtitle: Stay tuned for more image processing features!
